content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (x)
Consists of steam engine (position x), boiler (position y), and offshore pump (position z).

### Copper plate mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position (y1).
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position (y2).
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position (y3).

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (z1) and inserter at position (a) that puts into the assembling machine.
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to the assembling machine at position (z1).

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Ensure that you have enough raw materials available before attempting to craft or build new entities. Check your inventory regularly.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target location.

### Errors related to crafting limitations
- Regularly check the available crafting recipes and ensure you have the necessary ingredients to craft items.
